body: Sometimes a man likes big boobs, and other times he wants to know what short-haired small teacher is trying to say.
Que?! This is Netori xD, and even if you want to pass this like one, it’s not a”hard” one jajaja
I wish they would differentiate Netori from Netorare. It’s an entirely different experience imo (Netorare, Netori, Netorase…I mean please)
Thi is the best si far
